se_val: Thank you for wanting to make a donation to us! Below, you will see buttons to select the amount of your donation. To set the amount, simply press the middle button and you will be directed to the payment screen. Unfortunately, at the moment, donations are only accepted in BRL (Brazilian Real), but we will soon be adding more types of currencies. We greatly appreciate your support!
donation_subtitle: Make a donation to help us keep the bot running!
order_confirmed: We want to express our sincere gratitude for your generosity! We truly appreciate your donation. With your contribution, we will be able to continue our work and achieve our goals. Your dedication and support mean the world to us.
